message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this fantastic product.  Given its value and features, I'm asking for $14,000.  I'm confident it will exceed your expectations!
Hi Alice, thanks for the offer. While I'm interested, $14,000 is a bit higher than my budget.  I'm willing to pay $11,000 for the product,  considering its value to me.  Let me know what you think.
Hi Bob, thanks for your interest and counter-offer. I understand your perspective on the price.  How about we meet in the middle at $12,500? This reflects the product's true value.
